languages.text: "Ты зря плетешь свою паутину обмана — тьма незнания больше не укрывает тебя. {name} видел{mf||а} следы твоих деяний, слышал{mf||а} стон измученной Лилэтан, ступал{mf||а} среди распада, что ты принесла на Первозданный мир. Хватит лжи, отродье Хаоса!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты зря плетешь свою паутину обмана — тьма незнания больше не укрывает тебя. {name} видел{mf||а} следы твоих деяний, слышал{mf||а} стон измученной Лилэтан, ступал{mf||а} среди распада, что ты принесла на Первозданный мир. Хватит лжи, отродье Хаоса!"

languages.text: "You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"
languages.original_text: "Ты зря плетешь свою паутину обмана — тьма незнания больше не укрывает тебя. {name} видел{mf||а} следы твоих деяний, слышал{mf||а} стон измученной Лилэтан, ступал{mf||а} среди распада, что ты принесла на Первозданный мир. Хватит лжи, отродье Хаоса!"

traits.locale_text: "You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

"You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

"You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

"You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

languages.text: “你徒劳地编织着你的欺骗之网，别以为你能继续躲在无知之幕后面了。{name}已经看到了你所作所为的证据，听到了被折磨的莉莱赞发出的哭声，亲身走在了你为这个世界带来的衰败之中。你的谎言到此为止了，混沌的走狗！”
languages.original_text: "You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

traits.locale_text: “你徒劳地编织着你的欺骗之网，别以为你能继续躲在无知之幕后面了。{name}已经看到了你所作所为的证据，听到了被折磨的莉莱赞发出的哭声，亲身走在了你为这个世界带来的衰败之中。你的谎言到此为止了，混沌的走狗！”

languages.text: «Su red de engaños ha sido en vano, ya no puede ocultarse tras el velo de la ignorancia. {name} ha visto de primera mano sus acciones, ha oído los gritos del Lilaethan torturado y ha caminado entre la putrefacción que ha traído a este mundo virgen. ¡Basta de mentiras, escoria del Caos!».
languages.original_text: "You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

traits.locale_text: «Su red de engaños ha sido en vano, ya no puede ocultarse tras el velo de la ignorancia. {name} ha visto de primera mano sus acciones, ha oído los gritos del Lilaethan torturado y ha caminado entre la putrefacción que ha traído a este mundo virgen. ¡Basta de mentiras, escoria del Caos!».

languages.text: 「偽りを張り巡らしても無駄だ。無知のベールに隠れることは、もはやできない。{name}はお前の行いの証拠を見つけ、リラエタンの苦悩の叫びを聞き、お前がメイデンワールドにもたらした腐朽の只中を歩いてきた。嘘は聞き飽きた、混沌の手先め！」
languages.original_text: "You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

traits.locale_text: 「偽りを張り巡らしても無駄だ。無知のベールに隠れることは、もはやできない。{name}はお前の行いの証拠を見つけ、リラエタンの苦悩の叫びを聞き、お前がメイデンワールドにもたらした腐朽の只中を歩いてきた。嘘は聞き飽きた、混沌の手先め！」

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euer Intrigennetz umsonst gesponnen – Ihr könnt Euch nicht länger hinter dem Schleier der Ahnungslosigkeit verbergen. {name} hat die Beweise Eurer Taten gesehen, die Schreie der gepeinigten Lileath gehört und den Verfall durchschritten, den Ihr der Jungfernwelt gebracht habt. Schluss mit Euren Lügen, Dienerin des Chaos!"
languages.original_text: "You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euer Intrigennetz umsonst gesponnen – Ihr könnt Euch nicht länger hinter dem Schleier der Ahnungslosigkeit verbergen. {name} hat die Beweise Eurer Taten gesehen, die Schreie der gepeinigten Lileath gehört und den Verfall durchschritten, den Ihr der Jungfernwelt gebracht habt. Schluss mit Euren Lügen, Dienerin des Chaos!"

languages.text: « Vous avez tissé votre toile de tromperie en vain, inutile d'essayer de feindre l'ignorance. {name} a vu les preuves de vos actes, entendu les cris de la lilaethan tourmentée, marché parmi la dégénérescence que vous avez infligée au monde vierge. Vos mensonges ne prennent plus, ignoble servante du Chaos ! »
languages.original_text: "You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez tissé votre toile de tromperie en vain, inutile d'essayer de feindre l'ignorance. {name} a vu les preuves de vos actes, entendu les cris de la lilaethan tourmentée, marché parmi la dégénérescence que vous avez infligée au monde vierge. Vos mensonges ne prennent plus, ignoble servante du Chaos ! »

languages.text: "Yalan ağlarını boşuna örmüşsün, artık cehalet kisvesinin ardına saklanamazsın. {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım} neler yaptığını gözleriyle gördü, eziyet çeken Lilaethan'ın çığlıklarını kulaklarıyla duydu, Bakir Dünya'yı içine attığın yozlukta yürüdü. Yetti palavraların sefil Kaos dölü!"
languages.original_text: "You have woven your web of deceit in vain — you can no longer hide behind the veil of ignorance. {name} has seen the evidence of your deeds, heard the cries of the tormented Lilaethan, walked amidst the decay that you brought to the Maiden World. Enough of your lies, Chaos wretch!"

traits.locale_text: "Yalan ağlarını boşuna örmüşsün, artık cehalet kisvesinin ardına saklanamazsın. {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım} neler yaptığını gözleriyle gördü, eziyet çeken Lilaethan'ın çığlıklarını kulaklarıyla duydu, Bakir Dünya'yı içine attığın yozlukta yürüdü. Yetti palavraların sefil Kaos dölü!"
